<a id="AtlasTexture"></a>

# AtlasTexture

**Inherits:** [Texture2D](Texture2D.md) **\<** [Texture](Texture.md) **\<** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

A texture that crops out part of another Texture2D.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

[Texture2D](Texture2D.md) resource that draws only part of its [atlas](AtlasTexture.md#AtlasTexture_property_atlas) texture, as defined by the [region](AtlasTexture.md#AtlasTexture_property_region). An additional [margin](AtlasTexture.md#AtlasTexture_property_margin) can also be set, which is useful for small adjustments.

Multiple **AtlasTexture** resources can be cropped from the same [atlas](AtlasTexture.md#AtlasTexture_property_atlas). Packing many smaller textures into a singular large texture helps to optimize video memory costs and render calls.

\ **Note:** **AtlasTexture** cannot be used in an [AnimatedTexture](AnimatedTexture.md), and will not tile properly in nodes such as [TextureRect](TextureRect.md) or [Sprite2D](Sprite2D.md). To tile an **AtlasTexture**, modify its [region](AtlasTexture.md#AtlasTexture_property_region) instead.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

<!-- classref-descriptions-group -->

## Property Descriptions

<a id="AtlasTexture_property_atlas"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Texture2D](Texture2D.md) **atlas** [ðŸ”—](#AtlasTexture_property_atlas)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_atlas**\ (\ value\: [Texture2D](Texture2D.md)\ )
- [Texture2D](Texture2D.md) **get_atlas**\ (\ )

The texture that contains the atlas. Can be any type inheriting from [Texture2D](Texture2D.md), including another **AtlasTexture**.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="AtlasTexture_property_filter_clip"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **filter_clip** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#AtlasTexture_property_filter_clip)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_filter_clip**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **has_filter_clip**\ (\ )

If ``true``, the area outside of the [region](AtlasTexture.md#AtlasTexture_property_region) is clipped to avoid bleeding of the surrounding texture pixels.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="AtlasTexture_property_margin"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Rect2](Rect2.md) **margin** = `Rect2(0, 0, 0, 0)` [ðŸ”—](#AtlasTexture_property_margin)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_margin**\ (\ value\: [Rect2](Rect2.md)\ )
- [Rect2](Rect2.md) **get_margin**\ (\ )

The margin around the [region](AtlasTexture.md#AtlasTexture_property_region). Useful for small adjustments. If the [Rect2.size](Rect2.md#Rect2_property_size) of this property ("w" and "h" in the editor) is set, the drawn texture is resized to fit within the margin.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="AtlasTexture_property_region"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Rect2](Rect2.md) **region** = `Rect2(0, 0, 0, 0)` [ðŸ”—](#AtlasTexture_property_region)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_region**\ (\ value\: [Rect2](Rect2.md)\ )
- [Rect2](Rect2.md) **get_region**\ (\ )

The region used to draw the [atlas](AtlasTexture.md#AtlasTexture_property_atlas). If either dimension of the region's size is ``0``, the value from [atlas](AtlasTexture.md#AtlasTexture_property_atlas) size will be used for that axis instead.
